about_the_game:
Manage your orders to ensure nobody waits too long - your business depends on it!

Find the most efficient way to serve customers and get into the zone to manage multiple orders and keep your customers satisfied.

Or opt for a more relaxed approach, take it slower and focus on crafting each recipe with the utmost care - you decide how to play.

Collect new recipes and customise your own menu! Will you specialise in tasty snacks, regional cuisine or draw crowds with your signature coffee?

Purchase and upgrade your equipment, kitting out your kitchen as you want. With each new appliance, your recipe options will expand!

You will build your cafe business from the ground up - converting your shabby old campervan into a state-of-the-art mobile cafe.

Your journey will take you across the British Isles - visiting real locations throughout Scotland, Ireland, Wales, and England.

Manage your finances, upgrade your equipment and make choices that will ultimately keep your coffee dreams alive. The road to success is not easy but with some clever strategy and a dash of creativity, your skills will take you far!

Test your abilities against friends and other players from around the world!

Challenge Mode offers a competitive, rogue-like experience, perfect for jumping right into the action.

Worldwide leaderboards offer you a way to measure your progress - could you become the world’s best barista?

With a rogue-like skill system and a diverse selection of choices to make, each playthrough will offer you fresh options.

Will you specialise in artisanal coffee or opt for a commercial enterprise? Will you race to expand your coffee business or take a more relaxed approach?

In Single Espresso, your choices matter - and there is no one right way to play. You can shape your own adventure.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510

short_description: Transform your old camper van into a thriving mobile cafe! Master coffee-making skills, customise your kitchen and serve delicious recipes as you embark on a trip around the British Isles. Live your ultimate cafe adventure in this cosy yet fast-paced barista and cafe sim - Single Espresso!
